definition: lit. cannot rest or eat in peace (idiom)/fig. extremely worried and troubled
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: She couldn’t eat or sleep that night and prayed to God to help her.
sentences.chinese: 她晚上寝食难安并且祈祷上帝帮助她。

sentences.english: My house is quiet, but I forget to eat (food is tasteless). I forget to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 我的房子周围很安静，但我总是食不知味，寝食难安。

sentences.english: Not every project has failure risks like that, things that keep you awake at night with worry.
sentences.chinese: 并非每个项目都有一些让你寝食难安的失败风险。

sentences.english: And I couldn't sleep over the weekend. I've been tormented.
sentences.chinese: 可整个周末，我都因此而寝食难安。

sentences.english: He says more than a decade more nights without sleep, awake at night grievances.
sentences.chinese: 他更道出十多年来夜不安眠，寝食难安的苦况。

definition: no thought for tea or rice (idiom); melancholic and suffering/to have no appetite
to be unable to carry on even for a single day/to be in a desperate situation
(saying) to be very scared and on edge
to be unable to sleep at night
lit. badly burned about the head (from trying to put out a fire) (idiom)/fig. hard-pressed/under pressure (from a heavy workload, creditors etc)
lit. as if sitting on pins and needles (idiom)/fig. to be in an uncomfortable situation
to be both mentally and physically exhausted (idiom)
deeply worried and sick at heart (idiom)
